meta-runner.name: SitecoreDXG RabbitMQ Middleman Runner
meta-runner.description: Meta-Runner for executing SitecoreDXG generation using the default RabbitMQ AMQP middleman

param.name: env.SitecoreDXG.Middlemen.RabbitMQ_AMQP.ConnectionString
param.spec: text display='normal' description='The RabbitMQ connection string that you wish to use to connect to RabbitMQ (e.g. amqp://localhost)' label='RabbitMQ Connection String' validationMode='not_empty'

param.name: env.SitecoreDXG.Middlemen.RabbitMQ_AMQP.GenerationQueueName
param.spec: text display='normal' description='The name of the generation queue that you want to submit the serialized architecture queue; by default, the queue that you choose determines the generation action that should occur; the available default queues are the generation_queue__documentation queue (generate HTML documentation) and the generation_queue__mdj queue (generate MDJ file only).' label='Generation Queue Name' validationMode='not_empty'

param.name: env.SitecoreDXG.Middlemen.RabbitMQ_AMQP.ArchitectureGetUrl
param.spec: text display='normal' description='SitecoreUML Service URL for getting the serialized template architecture of the host Sitecore solution (generally http://<sitecore_url>/sitecoreuml/sitecoredxg/GetTemplateArchitecture)' label='Architecture GET URL' validationMode='not_empty'

param.name: env.SitecoreDXG.Middlemen.RabbitMQ_AMQP.CompletionHandlerNames
param.spec: text display='normal' description='(Optional) Comma-delimited list of the names of the completion handlers that should be called after successful generation' label='Completion Handler Names' validationMode='any'

param.name: env.SitecoreDXG.Middlemen.RabbitMQ_AMQP.ScriptPath
param.spec: text display='normal' description='The path to the middleman script file on the TeamCity server (customizable for extensibility purposes)' label='Middleman Script Path' validationMode='not_empty'

parameters.param:
Write-Output "Installing Dependencies..."
$scriptDir = (Get-Item %env.SitecoreDXG.Middlemen.RabbitMQ_AMQP.ScriptPath%).Directory.FullName $currentLoc = Get-Location Set-Location $scriptDir npm install Set-Location $currentLoc
Write-Output "Dependencies installed"
Write-Output "Calling SitecoreDXG Middleman..."
node %env.SitecoreDXG.Middlemen.RabbitMQ_AMQP.ScriptPath% %env.SitecoreDXG.Middlemen.RabbitMQ_AMQP.ConnectionString% %env.SitecoreDXG.Middlemen.RabbitMQ_AMQP.ArchitectureGetUrl% %env.SitecoreDXG.Middlemen.RabbitMQ_AMQP.GenerationQueueName% %env.SitecoreDXG.Middlemen.RabbitMQ_AMQP.CompletionHandlerNames%
Write-Output "Finished calling SitecoreDXG Middleman..."
